thread.title: Dattatraya Kulkarni

author: Dattatraya Kulkarni
title: Dattatraya Kulkarni
text: I had ordered the fossil watch from Jomashop. The delivery was made within timelines mentioned on the site. The product I received was new and it was in great condition. I am using it now and then it works great and I love my watch. One thing that could have gone better is the box in which the watch was delivered. Now days fossil gives sturdy cases while shopping at fossil outlet. I got in the tin box. Box was good however it could be improved.
